main.name: Jean Pierre-Louis (JP)
main.description: I am a QA Advocate and I use technology to make things happen
main.bio: Leader, Technologist, Entreprenuer, Father, Trouble-maker :) I build apps using different technologies, I'm not married to one language but I have long term relationship with Javascript :) and all of it's associating frameworkes.Every problem has 3 solutions (The right one, The sophisticated one or the JP one)

resume.skillmessage: I can automated anything, UI, Native apps, Processes and create custom solutions

education.description: I learned more about myself than I did book content, I build a few projects for the department and did a ton of work for the community.
These three certifications were helpful at the time when I was building VMs for a medical lab but now they help me setup VMs for personal use
One of the toughest certs I have received, I use the skilss I learned daily.

work.title: Manager of Sofware Quality Assurance
work.description: Leading teams, advocating for quality and taking names.
